org.apache.flink.runtime.operators.hash

类 InPlaceMutableHashTable.RecordArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.operators.hash.InPlaceMutableHashTable.RecordArea
  • 封闭类:
    InPlaceMutableHashTable<T>

    private final class InPlaceMutableHashTable.RecordArea
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulates the memory segments that belong to the record area. It - can append a record - can overwrite a record at an arbitrary position (WARNING: the new record must have the same size as the old one) - can be rewritten by calling resetAppendPosition - takes memory from InPlaceMutableHashTable.freeMemorySegments on append

    • 方法详细资料

      • addSegment

        private void addSegment()
                 throws java.io.EOFException
        抛出:
        java.io.EOFException

      • giveBackSegments

        public void giveBackSegments()
        Moves all its memory segments to freeMemorySegments. Warning: this will leave the RecordArea in an unwritable state: you have to call setWritePosition before writing again.

      • getTotalSize

        public long getTotalSize()

      • setWritePosition

        private void setWritePosition(long position)
                       throws java.io.EOFException
        抛出:
        java.io.EOFException

      • resetAppendPosition

        public void resetAppendPosition()
        Sets appendPosition and the write position to 0, so that appending starts overwriting elements from the beginning. (This is used in rebuild.) Note: if data was written to the area after the current appendPosition before a call to resetAppendPosition, it should still be readable. To release the segments after the current append position, call freeSegmentsAfterAppendPosition()

      • freeSegmentsAfterAppendPosition

        public void freeSegmentsAfterAppendPosition()
        Releases the memory segments that are after the current append position. Note: The situation that there are segments after the current append position can arise from a call to resetAppendPosition().

      • overwritePointerAt

        public void overwritePointerAt(long pointer,
                               long value)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Overwrites the long value at the specified position.
        参数:
        pointer - Points to the position to overwrite.
        value - The value to write.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • overwriteRecordAt

        public void overwriteRecordAt(long pointer,
                              DataInputView input,
                              int size)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Overwrites a record at the sepcified position. The record is read from a DataInputView (this will be the staging area). WARNING: The record must not be larger than the original record.
        参数:
        pointer - Points to the position to overwrite.
        input - The DataInputView to read the record from
        size - The size of the record
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • appendPointerAndCopyRecord

        public long appendPointerAndCopyRecord(long pointer,
                                       DataInputView input,
                                       int recordSize)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Appends a pointer and a record. The record is read from a DataInputView (this will be the staging area).
        参数:
        pointer - The pointer to write (Note: this is NOT the position to write to!)
        input - The DataInputView to read the record from
        recordSize - The size of the record
        返回:
        A pointer to the written data
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - (EOFException specifically, if memory ran out)

      • appendPointerAndRecord

        public long appendPointerAndRecord(long pointer,
                                   T record)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Appends a pointer and a record.
        参数:
        pointer - The pointer to write (Note: this is NOT the position to write to!)
        record - The record to write
        返回:
        A pointer to the written data
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - (EOFException specifically, if memory ran out)

      • noSeekAppendPointerAndRecord

        public long noSeekAppendPointerAndRecord(long pointer,
                                         T record)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Appends a pointer and a record. Call this function only if the write position is at the end!
        参数:
        pointer - The pointer to write (Note: this is NOT the position to write to!)
        record - The record to write
        返回:
        A pointer to the written data
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - (EOFException specifically, if memory ran out)
